name: RSS Not Before
author: Paul Moukperian

sections.description:
When importing your blog from blogger you may cause your posts to reappear as duplicates in your subscribers feed readers, unless you install this plugin and set the “Not Before” date to the day you switch.

This plugin works best if you have already been using feedburner to “burn” your feeds in blogger.

Why would I use this plugin?

If you are using blogger and feedburner, then after you import your posts into wordpress and change your feedburner “Original Feed”, your subscribers will see all your old posts reappear in their news readers as new unread posts. This plugin allows you to remove all those “old posts” from the rss feed which, after switched the feedburner feed source, will make the blogger to wordpress transition completely seamless.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire rss-not-before folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq: If you have questions about this plugin, please send them to http://inventfilm.com

short_description: RSS Not Before provides the ability to remove posts from the rss feeds prior to a given date.
